title: 🌅MORNING SPECIAL🌅2BR w/ HEAT & HARDWOOD FLOORS $1115
posting_body: Visit our website to view videos of our available apartments or call now to schedule a virtual tour!
All you need is an internet connection."
Here's a little info about your new neighborhood in Riverdale (60827) near S Halsted St and W 144th St.
This location is a six-minute walk from the ME Metra Electric at the Ivanhoe stop.
Also accessible via 348 Harvey-Riverdale bus line.
Nearby grocery stores: Village Groceries, Herman Foods, Ultra Foods, and Pete's Fresh Market.
We have plenty of units available in Chicago, Park Forest, Sauk Village, West Austin, Maywood, Broadview, and many more.
If replying by email please remember to include your phone # and/or email address in your response so we can follow up with you directly.
***Please note that photos are a representation of a model apartment and may not be pictures of the actual unit.
